title: BIORAY Kids® Vaccine Companion Kit (Large)
author: Heather Mcleod
description: BIORAY Kids Vaccine Companion Kit BIORAY Kids Vaccine Companion Kit® supports healthy adrenal, liver, gastrointestinal and cellular function, while removing heavy metals and environmental toxins. This kit is intended for children aged 12 months to 12 years old. Large Kit includes: 1 - NDF Calm (4oz) 1 - NDF Tummy (4oz)

As Low As$159.75 Happy we started purchasing these for my kids, it's helped in so many ways I can see my son make little improvements in his behavior. Just started using these for 3 weeks and I notice a change in him. :) Great deal for three bottles! I have been using all three products for my child and I have seen great results, I also use bioray happy, which I purchase individually. Been using for 2 weeks. Calm is very effective. As for Focus, it's too early to give a real feedback. My kids take these daily and they are a game changer-Mentally, emotionally and physically!!! They are an investment in to your kids health.
